rendered:
嗗嗗嗗
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

嗗字的基本解释

嗗
wā
吞咽声。

嗗
gǔ
〔闷嗗咄〕闷闷地一声不响，如：“那宝玉不理，竟回来躺在床上，只是嗗嗗嗗的。”
象声词：“怎见得好风，嗗????如同虎吼……。”

嗗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wā］
［《廣韻》烏八切，入黠，影。］
(1)象声词。吞饮声。
(2)象声词。哭声。
[②]［gū］
见“嗗2突”。

嗗字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗗； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页202第36
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏八切，音穵。【廣韻】飮聲。

嗗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嗗字的起名意思

暂无。

Ay
Basic explanation of words
Ay
wā
Swallowing sound.
Ay
gǔ
〔Mangyuedu] sullenly without making a sound, such as: "Then Baoyu ignored him and came back to lie on the bed, just wheezing."
Onomatopoeia: "How can you see a good wind, oh???? Like a tiger roar..."
Ay
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wā］
["Guangyun" black eight cut, into the point, shadow. ]
(1) Onomatopoeia. Swallowing sound.
(2) Onomatopoeia. Crying.
[②]［gū］
See "Oh 2 Sudden".
Ay
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗗; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 202 36
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu eight cut, sound 穵. [Guang Yun] Sing sound.
Ay

Nothing.
wā, gū
(Cant.) quarter of an hour
